entities.name: quidditch world cup
entities.description: The Quidditch World Cup is mentioned as an event where Krum and Lynch are participating.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is a participant in the Quidditch World Cup, described as flying with ease and concentration.

entities.name: lynch
entities.description: Lynch is also a participant in the Quidditch World Cup, described as being revived by mediwizards after being flattened during a dive.

entities.name: snitch
entities.description: The Snitch is mentioned as an object that Krum and Lynch are trying to catch during the Quidditch World Cup.

relationships.description: Krum is trying to catch the Snitch, as described in the text where he is darting his eyes over the ground below.
Lynch is copying Krum's movements during the Quidditch World Cup, as described in the text where it says 'Krum hadn't seen the Snitch at all, he was just making Lynch copy him.'
